attributes.title: Nithyananda on Yoga Sutras: What is Mind? A New Revelation
attributes.description: In this video taken from Yoga Sutra discourse (part 2), Paramahamsa Nithyananda describes what is mind in a never-before heard manner. With graphical description of how thoughts happen randomly and how mind is created, you will be seeing a totally new description of the mind.
